version_description:
5.0.2: Support for additional laser measures & minor bug fixes. New in 5.0:
- Stairs — add stairs by placing the phone down on the top/bottom step during a scan
- ExteriorScan — scan the outside of buildings
- PlotScan — scan yards and garden

5.0.2: Support for additional laser measures & minor bug fixes. New in 5.0:
- Stairs — add stairs by placing the phone down on the top/bottom step during a scan
- ExteriorScan — scan the outside of buildings
- PlotScan — scan yards and garden

5.0.2: Support for additional laser measures & minor bug fixes. New in 5.0:
- Stairs — add stairs by placing the phone down on the top/bottom step during a scan
- ExteriorScan — scan the outside of buildings
- PlotScan — scan yards and garden

Better presentation of room names in Pro mode
Thicker walls in Pro mode
Fix: Edits made immediately after autocorrect runs may be lost
Fix: Room title sometimes overlaps with top wall
Fix: Plan may zoom out too far when device switches from po

New 'Scale Model' mode displays your whole home as a scale model on your desk
Fixed walkthrough "View in AR" feature
Fix for problem with room shape getting corrupted when adding HomeKit accessories in AR mode

- 3D Scans can now have a Resume Scan button, making it easy to update the appearance in 3D, add or remove symbols.
- 3D Scans that are interrupted now continue seamlessly when you return to RoomScan.
- Significant performance and reliability improv
HomeKit integration for simple 3D control of your home — Sign up for the beta at locometric.com/cabin

- Numerous small improvements to the UI to make creating floor plans even easier
- Revised screen for selecting a scan method
- Double-tap on a room in whole-floor view to go straight to that room
- The default width chosen for new objects like d

RoomScan is switching to subscriptions in this version instead of export credits. You'll still be able to use remaining credits. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to tap the Get Assistance option on the (?) menu.

Scan with Camera has greatly improved recently — if like most users you only scan by touching walls, why not give it a try? For 1cm accuracy in Scan with Camera mode, try placing more than one marker on longer walls.

This version contains bug fixes

- Curved walls can now be scanned in Touching Walls mode. Just swipe your phone along the curve and the shape & measurements are captured.
- Various shapes with letters inside can now be added to plans, useful for fire plans etc.
